title: 20 mins afk GLITCH
body: so i got a 20 min afk ban and the timer seemed to be going slow so i put my timer on and it was going at half the speed it should be going!!! it took me 40 mins each game!!

replies.body: There are known issues regarding Leavebuster and it's punishments resetting. They should be fixed by next patch.
and now it just restarted the 20 mins after i waited wtf!!!! im %%%%ing pissed
